meta.description: Lufthansa Senator Lounge (Non-Schengen) at Frankfurt Airport (FRA), Terminal 1, Concourse Z. Learn more about the lounge: amenities, photos, review, opening hours, location.

lounge.name: Lufthansa Senator Lounge (Non-Schengen)

location.terminalDirections: Level 3, opposite the Duty Free Shop towards Gate Z50.

lounge.description: Offering a wide variety of premium snacks and drinks, the Lufthansa Lounges are sure to provide a welcoming atmosphere you seek prior to your flight.

warning: This location does not accept passengers in airline uniforms.

reviews.content: Nice Lufthansa Lounge with view.
Lounge does not allow access to United First class passengers without Senator Status.
Large and clean, good food. This is the main lounge near the gates UA uses.

Huge, well lit and stocked with a large variety of snacks. One of the best lounges I’ve been to. Showers, beds, and different areas to visit based on your activity (work, sleep, tables, couches, etc).
Large open area, would benefit from dividers/Spanish walls. Hot breakfast, good selection of beverages.
Excellent lounge, lots of space and hot breakfast with eggs and bacon.
Very nice lounge, views on the planes and a lot of seating. Was also quiet. Food & drinks could be improved, but showers are perfect (and with no wait when I was there in the morning).
Great Lounge. Digital verification, food not much but good at quality, few people.
Very large lounge, but the absence of a cocktail bar makes it less pleasant then the Senator B lounge...
Great lounge but very crowded mid morning.
Nice place to wait for flights to the US. There is an United agent available to assistance with seat assignments or ticket issues, which was very helpful.  Access for United Premier Gold.
Located centrally in TZ so accessible from most connecting flights. Has better food than business lounge above.
Immense lounge with plentiful seating options, including numerous recliners and a room with actual beds. Decent food and beverage selections, and expansive Tarmac views.
Much nicer than the old lounge. Larger, with sleeping room, new showers, and plenty of seating.
This lounge is so much nicer than the previous Tower lounge, which was much smaller. It's gigantic, feels very spacious, and has good views of the Tarmac. It was virtually empty when I arrived.

Spacious with lots of seating options. Good hot/cold food. Even a station where making 3 kinds of wrap. Poultry/tuna or veg. Desserts and self serve wine/champagne/2 beer on tap and liquor. Very good.
Very good lounge with plenty of space and facilities. Food is basic and the drinks are ok. Nice view and a well-rounded product.
Great lounge. Plenty of seating, decent food (plus gummy bears) and quiet. Good alcohol selection. Plenty of seating options.
Nice lounge! I arrived before 7am so I had a long shower and change of clothes. It stared filling up around 9am, not much food selection. Helpful and friendly staff.
Great lounge, quite spacious but fills up at peak times. Internet unbearable with full lounge but is great when not busy. Everything you need: food, drink, showers, lounge chairs, Internet.
Cold/hot food, self-serve drinks, comfy chairs, sofas, tables, and spotty WiFi at this lounge. Brusque front desk ladies, but nice servicemen inside. No flight announcements, so the lounge is quiet.
This full service lounge has a great food bar, smoking lounge, work spaces, and a relaxation room. The only negative to this lounge is that it is generally pretty busy.
This spacious lounge has several seats and a shower. However, there are not many food options.

location.terminalDirections: Next to Gate A13, Level 2, opposite the Duty Free Shop.
Near Gate A26, proceed one level up to the entrance.
Level 2, opposite the Duty Free Shop, next to Gate A13.
Level 2, opposite the Duty Free Shop, towards Gate A50.
Located behind Airport Entrance 13 (Tor 13) when arriving by car.
After Passport Control, proceed towards Gates B24-B28 and take the lift or stairs to the lounge entrance.
After Passport Control, proceed towards Gates B44-B48 and take the lift or stairs to the lounge entrance.
Departure Area B, next to Gate B22.
Departure Area B, opposite Gate B42, next to Gate B43.
Outside of Passport Control and Security Checkpoint, Arrival Area B, immediately behind the Baggage Claim.
Landside, between Concourses B and C on the Gallery Level, next to the Travel Market (Reisemarkt).
After Passport Control but before final Security Checkpoint, Departure Area C, near Gates C14-C15.
After Passport Control but before final Security Checkpoint, Departure Area C, near Gate C14 and Gate C15.
Level 4, opposite the Duty Free Shop towards Gate Z50.
